name: Killer (itch)
description:
SCHIZOID BAND presents:

KILLER

SIDE A track 1

Album INITIATION

2014

_

The idea is simple as well as the mechanics and graphics. in 80 levels.

10 seconds are the essence of a killer. The actions of a killer are unpredictable, methodical and fast, but always have a constant pattern.

In the game, the killer is the Screen. Our Screen.

The screen moves in all directions, turning into a thirsty killer.

original idea in Game Jam LUDUM DARE 27

_

schizoid band

game by andre teruya eichemberg

sound design by william butler poletto (https://soundcloud.com/willi90)

Time of development: 3 months
